content:
Sure, here's a sample No Objection Certificate (NOC) that can be used for an employee leaving a company:

[Date]

To Whom It May Concern,

This is to certify that [Employee Name], who has been working as [Employee Designation] at [Company Name], has submitted his/her resignation on [Resignation Date] and will be relieved from his/her duties on [Last Working Day].

We confirm that we have no objection to the employee leaving the company and wish him/her all the best in their future endeavors.

Furthermore, we certify that there are no pending dues to be paid to the employee, and all company property has been returned.

We appreciate the services rendered by [Employee Name] during his/her tenure with us and thank him/her for the contributions made towards the growth of our organization.

Sincerely,

[Authorized Signatory]
[Company Name]
